title: Were All Speed Limit Cameras on Two Major English Roads Set to 72 MPH in January 2019?
subtitle: A viral social media message warned users in the U.K. about driving on the M1 and M25.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In early January 2019, all speed cameras on the M1 and M25 motorways in England were simultaneously activated, with a uniform speed limit of 72 miles per hour.
